name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: EMP, TMP & SWMS.
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencement of excavation.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Area has been set out in accordance with the drawings

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit or DBYD must be issued prior to any excavation commencing. Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task. Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
RESPONSIBILITY: SWA Project Manager/SWA SEQ Adviser
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Formwork shall comply with the requirements of AS 3610
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Steel reinforcement shall comply with the requirements of AS/NZS 4671. Minimum cover of 50mm.

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: If obstructing waterways, culverts or channels, temporary diversion of discharge of drainage and stormwater to be in place. Obtain written approval from relevant waterway authority.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Crushed rock bedding material as per drawings
○ Bedding trimmed, moistened, and compacted as necessary
○ Bedding compacted thickness: Footpaths and other surfacing ≥ 50mm
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VcRoads Std Specs 703.18 IFC Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete strength as per drawing speciﬁcation
○ Concrete to be satisfactorily compacted. Proﬁle transitions between 10-20mm per metre.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VicRoads Std Specs 703.04(b), VicRoads Std Specs 703.20, VicRoads Std Specs 703.21 IFC Drawings AS 1379
RESPONSIBILITY: SWA Project Manager/RRV Superintendent/External testing Company representat ive
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Footpaths and other Surfacing: Wooden ﬂoat ﬁnish
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VicRoads Std Specs 703.13 IFC Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Footpaths and other surfacing:
○ Prevent bonding between edging and surfacing. Either paint back of edging with bitumen or use a strip of bituminous felt material.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Topsoil compacted in layers < 150mm
○ Width ≥ 300mm behind edging to top of edging
○ Topsoil placed after 3 days of concrete placement
The signature below veriﬁes that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and veriﬁes lot compliance with speciﬁcations.
